title: D F S
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: d_f_s
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with D F S. The average
  contract duration was 2.64 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $755.2K. The longest
  contract was 9.4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $9.1M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.9M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '48'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '27'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '56%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '95%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '3.26'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '14.8M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.64'
s421_mean_contract_value: '755.2K'
s425_max_duration: '9.4'
s422_max_contract_value: '9.1M'
---
